# Renv status

```{r}
r <- renv::status()
r$synchronized

r1 <- r$library$Packages |>
  lapply(\(x) x[c("Package", "Version")] |>
           unlist() |>
           paste(collapse = "_")) |> 
  unlist()

r2 <- r$lockfile$Packages |> 
  lapply(\(x) x[c("Package", "Version")] |> 
           unlist() |> paste(collapse = "_")) |> 
  unlist()

setdiff(r1, r2)
```
